title: River Spirit Nami Visual Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body:
Since somewhere around the **_6.19 patch_**, I've been noticing that the purple round thing on the right side of River Spirit Nami's tail is missing. Upon closer look, it seems like it hasn't disappeared, but somehow bent downwards and stuck to the frontal part of the tail (the one that faces the ground), like making a 180 degree turn. Sometimes it even goes through the tail a little.

After further inspection, I have concluded that the thing isn't always positioned in this abnormal way. Sometimes it goes back to normal. I did some tests and these are the results:


**ABNORMAL POSITION:**
when moving normally
when moving with a speed buff (homeguard, her passive, etc.)
joke _(ctrl + 1)_
taunt _(ctrl + 2)_
when using W, E, R
when using flash

**NORMAL POSITION:**
dance _(ctrl + 3)_
laugh _(ctrl+ 4)_
during recall
when using Q
death animation



I've included **2 pics:**
 [**_In movement_**](http://oi68.tinypic.com/1f0ya.jpg) and [**_joke (ctrl + 1)_**](http://oi66.tinypic.com/2isjbwo.jpg)

And **2 videos: **
[**_Emotes_**](http://media6000.dropshots.com/photos/1362832/20161109/094950.mp4) and [**_In combat_**](http://media6000.dropshots.com/photos/1362832/20161109/094952.mp4)



Now the bug itself isn't that bad since it doesn't really affect how well one plays, but if it's one of your favorite skins you'll probably be a little frustrated every time you enter the Rift XD (especially if you're a Nami main).



> {{champion:267}}  _Rito pls fix my tail_

replies.body: Gahh, this is a weighting issue! D: This was fixed at one point, but may have occurred again. Lemme check this out!
